LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult01.title: Sole survivor
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult01.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a remote tribal village. When mechanoid centipedes attacked [PAWN_possessive] home and killed [PAWN_possessive] people, [PAWN_pronoun] was the last survivor.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult02.title: Tribal hunter
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult02.baseDesc: A proficient hunter and tracker, [PAWN_nameDef] yearned for more. [PAWN_pronoun] took leave from [PAWN_possessive] village, traveling the world in search of exotic game.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult03.title: Storyteller
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult03.baseDesc: To fill [PAWN_possessive] belly, [PAWN_nameDef] would wander from village to village recounting tribal legends and lore.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult04.title: Wandering healer
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult04.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned to be a healer, but never gained the respect of [PAWN_possessive] exacting teacher. Chafing under his overbearing tutelage, [PAWN_pronoun] chose to leave the safety of [PAWN_possessive] village and travel the world to seek [PAWN_possessive] fame and fortune.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult05.title: War chief
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult05.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tribal raider leader. For [PAWN_objective], the battlefield is a game, and there is nothing more fun than the fires of war.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult06.title: Bandit leader
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult06.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became proficient at ambushing caravans, eventually becoming the leader of one of the most notorious gangs of tribal raider bandits.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult07.title: Tribal faction leader
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult07.baseDesc: Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_objective]self surrounded by a gaggle of tribal low-lifes. Just for fun, [PAWN_pronoun] gathered them together and lead them to certain death. [PAWN_pronoun] knew then that [PAWN_pronoun] had the talent to realize [PAWN_possessive] ambitions of leadership.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult08.title: Hermit
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult08.baseDesc: Separated from [PAWN_possessive] tribe after a disaster, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_objective]self lost and alone. [PAWN_pronoun] eked out a lonely existence with only a herd of muffalo for company.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult09.title: Master trader
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult09.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master at trading, known for [PAWN_possessive] ruthless bargaining skills.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult10.title: Raider chief
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult10.baseDesc: After joining a tribal raider faction, [PAWN_nameDef]'s charismatic yet cunning nature allowed [PAWN_objective] to win over [PAWN_possessive] fellow raiders and usurp the leader's position as raider chief. [PAWN_possessive] band of raiders has gained notoriety across the world.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult11.title: Ruthless tribal raider
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult11.baseDesc: Captured by a band of tribal raiders, [PAWN_nameDef] discovered that [PAWN_pronoun] fit in perfectly with [PAWN_possessive] captors. Shortly after becoming one of the tribe, [PAWN_nameDef] began to kill anyone or anything that got in [PAWN_possessive] way... including [PAWN_possessive] fellow raiders.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult12.title: Tribal raider chief
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult12.baseDesc: As a tribal raider chief, [PAWN_nameDef] is well-known for [PAWN_possessive] cunning plans and skillful traps. [PAWN_pronoun] is never afraid to sacrifice a few pawns to capture an important target. [PAWN_possessive] name has been linked more than once to strategies that overcame overwhelming odds.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult13.title: Vengeful chief
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult13.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a proud tribal raider chief, until [PAWN_pronoun] was ousted from [PAWN_possessive] position by a mutinous rebellion. Lucky to escape with [PAWN_possessive] life, [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to seek revenge and regain [PAWN_possessive] position.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult14.title: Captured tribal raider
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult14.baseDesc: During a raid, [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by tribal raiders. Starting as nothing more than a slave, [PAWN_pronoun] rose quickly among the raider ranks until all knew [PAWN_possessive] name and [PAWN_possessive] ruthlessness.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult15.title: Shaman of shadows
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult15.baseDesc: When the monsters of fire came from the sky, [PAWN_nameDef] was called upon by [PAWN_possessive] tribe to guide them into battle. [PAWN_nameDef] made use of medicines and rituals to inspire and lead the warriors against the invaders. Despite their superior technology, the pirates were forced to retreat without capturing a single slave.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult16.title: Tribal wanderer
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult16.baseDesc: A violent drifter without a home, [PAWN_nameDef] fought in many wars and battles. [PAWN_pronoun] became a grizzled warrior and a deadly shot.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult17.title: Wandering crafter
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult17.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] followed [PAWN_possessive] parents' nomadic ways, supporting [PAWN_objective]self with [PAWN_possessive] crafting skills. But wandering is a hard life, and [PAWN_pronoun] often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put [PAWN_possessive] skills to good use.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult18.title: Banished warrior
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult18.baseDesc: Accused of murdering a prominent tribal elder, [PAWN_nameDef] was banished from [PAWN_possessive] tribe. Rumors of [PAWN_possessive] crime followed [PAWN_objective], and no other tribe would accept [PAWN_objective]. Forced to wander the world, [PAWN_pronoun] supported [PAWN_objective]self as he could with [PAWN_possessive] crafting or [PAWN_possessive] combat skills. But wandering is a hard life, and [PAWN_pronoun] often dreamed of finding a tribe that would welcome [PAWN_objective] permanently.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult19.title: Thief
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult19.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was caught stealing from a respected shaman and banished from the tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] joined a tribe of raiders and adopted their brutal ways. Knowing that showing weakness could be fatal, [PAWN_pronoun] closed [PAWN_objective]self off to others.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult20.title: Tribal raider
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult20.baseDesc: As a young adult, [PAWN_nameDef] abandoned [PAWN_possessive] tribe and joined a band of raiders. [PAWN_pronoun] found camaraderie amongst its members, even if [PAWN_pronoun] did have to constantly watch [PAWN_possessive] back around them.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult21.title: Loner
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult21.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never much liked the tribal council or the yearly festivals. [PAWN_pronoun] prefers the open plain and the lonely whistle of wind through the rocks. [PAWN_pronoun] visits [PAWN_possessive] tribe from time to time, but for the most part [PAWN_pronoun] takes care of [PAWN_objective]self using [PAWN_possessive] own survival skills.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult22.title: Scout
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult22.baseDesc: Since [PAWN_possessive] tribe has made contact with local outlanders, [PAWN_nameDef] has contracted [PAWN_possessive] services out as a guide to the local area. Frequent contact with ancient relics has made [PAWN_objective] fairly comfortable with the old technology.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult23.title: Warrior
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult23.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a fearsome warrior, proficient with many weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] has participated in many battles.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult24.title: Gatherer
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult24.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master gatherer. [PAWN_pronoun] can find food in the most barren of places using [PAWN_possessive] deep knowledge of plants, roots, and berries.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult25.title: Lore keeper
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult25.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of a long line of lore keepers in [PAWN_possessive] tribe. Every night around the fire, [PAWN_pronoun] passes on ancient knowledge and helpful wisdom through stories, all designed to improve [PAWN_possessive] tribe's raiding.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult26.title: Weaver
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult26.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert at working muffalo wool, plant fibres and natural dyes into beautiful clothing for [PAWN_possessive] kin. [PAWN_possessive] beautiful handicrafts are traded frequently between local tribes, and then often stolen back to be sold or traded again.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult27.title: Caravan leader
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult27.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is the leader of a tribal trade caravan. Due to [PAWN_possessive] nomadic lifestyle, [PAWN_pronoun] hunts, barters, and sometimes raids for [PAWN_possessive] food.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult28.title: Caravan member
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult28.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of a nomadic tribal trade caravan. [PAWN_pronoun] is often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Because [PAWN_pronoun] is able to barter or hunt for all of [PAWN_possessive] food, [PAWN_pronoun] never has to worry about growing or gathering food.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult29.title: Carver
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult29.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert at carving wood, stone, and bone into beautiful tools and art objects for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_possessive] beautiful handicrafts are traded frequently between local tribes, then often stolen back to be sold or traded again.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult30.title: Tribal drummer
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult30.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a drummer for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] performs songs for ceremonies and festivals, but specializes in war chants.
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult31.title: Tribal captive
LanguageData.TribalRaiderAdult31.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken captive by an enemy tribe during a raid. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to do hard manual labour. Over time [PAWN_possessive] new tribe has become like family. [PAWN_pronoun] has begun to raid with them, and hopes to be adopted as one of their own.
